item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: MoviePass is officially coming back (4 minute read) MoviePass co-founder Stacy Spikes has announced that the service will return this summer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-15
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at its iPhone 13 event (3 minute read) Apple has unveiled its latest line of hardware releases at its California Streaming event.
